name: Cube Clock
description:
Website.

A puzzle game where you block cubes to change their path.
The goal of the game is to destroy all red cubes and to keep the green ones.
Each time you move all cubes move as well, you as well as the cubes can do one of 5 things: move up, down, left, right and wait.
The green cube at the bottom shows if the time is passing.

Controls:
W, S, A, D - movement,
R - restart,
SPACE - wait,
ESC - exit.

The game is currently very short (3 levels), but there might be more later!
